ai-tha-ap423:0.3_0: He servings of food and drink in the next;
ai-tha-ap423:2.1_0: I took hold of what is required
ai-tha-ap423:3.1_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap423:3.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap423:3.4_0: I’ve had hold of a hut.
ai-tha-ap423:4.1_0: I keep on the wrong path,
ai-tha-ap423:4.3_0: With the simile of the government official,
ai-tha-ap423:5.4_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap423:6.4_0: my mind is immersed in samādhi.
ai-tha-ap423:7.1_0: leprosy, abscesses, mild leprosy, tuberculosis, and epilepsy,
ai-tha-ap423:8.2_0: nor does heart have no heart.
ai-tha-ap423:11.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap423:12.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap423:12.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap423:14.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap423:14.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap423:14.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap423:15.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsī.
ai-tha-ap423:16.1_0: After speaking, the seniorly was taught by the senior monks.
